com.oracle.truffle.api.vm

Class EventConsumer<Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.truffle.api.vm.EventConsumer<Event>
  • Type Parameters:
    Event - type of event to observe and handle
    Deprecated. 
    use Debugger .find(engine).startSession(new SuspendedCallback(){...}).suspendNext() instead

    @Deprecated
public abstract class EventConsumer<Event>
extends Object
    PolyglotEngine generates various events and delivers them to registered handlers. Each handler is registered for a particular type of event. Examples of events include ExecutionEvent or SuspendedEvent useful when debugging Truffle languages.
    Since:
    0.9

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventConsumer(Class<Event> eventType)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates new handler for specified event type.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void on(Event event)
      Deprecated. 
      Called by the PolyglotEngine when event of requested type appears.
